comment: TAKE THIS CLASS! He was one of the best profs I have taken. He gives detailed feedback and makes it impossible not to pass this class as long as you submit everything. I received a 100 on every assignment I turned in. He is very organized and gives one assignment a week. So easy. Also, fun to learn this material!

I took Professor Stanley's statistics course, and it was way more straightforward than I expected from a math course. The textbook was helpful, the assignments had clear instructions and actually understandable. I had to write this review because 10/10, recommend to anyone taking stats to take this course and it helped me understand stats better.
rating_tags: Clear grading criteria--Gives good feedback--Accessible outside class

comment: Prof. Christopher Stanley is a well organized and straight forward instructor. His weekly assignments are fairly easy, however they do include a bit of writing, but the assignment is easy. The test are usually five essay questions, which are also easy and straight forward. Great online class experience, strongly advise taking him.
I took this class asynchronous and it was easy. I love psych and the work is in the book. If you read the book you will pass! 10/10 recommend!!
